q: in exchange for Simon Cowell continuing with American Idol, Pop Idol would be pulled off the air, conceding the United Kingdom entirely to The X Factor. London's Independent newspaper quoted one senior music executive as saying, It has come out 75/25 in favor of Simon Cowell . He is the star. He had all the aces. But there was a catch, and a very big one indeed. In exchange for winning the airwaves in the United Kingdom, Simon Cowell forfeited his dream of bringing The X Factor to the United States.
